content: प्रियंगुः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a creeper (said to put forth blossoms at the touch of women); प्रियंगुश्यामांगप्रकृतिरपि <ls>Māl. 3. 9.</ls> (For some of the conventions of poets about the blossoming of trees, see the quotation under अशोक). {@--2@} Long pepper. --गु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} Saffron.
